mapper.select: select IFNULL(sum(amount),0) from where address=#{address} and create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
select IFNULL(sum(amount),0) as totalReward,IFNULL(avg(amount),0) as avgReward from where address=#{address}

SELECT date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as dataDate ,SUM(amount) as reward FROM `account_reward` where address =#{address} and create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') order by dataDate asc

SELECT d.miner_type as miner_type ,SUM(a.amount) as reward FROM account_reward a LEFT JOIN device d on a.address = d.address where a.owner_address = #{ownerAddress} and a.account_type = 2 group by d.miner_type
